unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Ishant Sharma? Heard he pulled a hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match on 02/02/2024. Hope he recovers before the IPL! Last I checked, physios at the NCA in Bangalore were working with him at 10:30 AM today, 05/02/2024. Any idea if he'll be fit for the Dharamshala Test on 25/02/2024? Fingers crossed! Get well soon, bhai!
normalised: Hey! Any news on Ishant Sharma? Heard he pulled a hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match on second February two thousand and twenty four. Hope he recovers before the I P L! Last I checked, physios at the N C A in Bangalore were working with him at ten thirty A M today, fifth February two thousand and twenty four. Any idea if he'll be fit for the Dharamshala Test on twenty fifth February two thousand and twenty four? Fingers crossed! Get well soon, bhai!
